title.narrative: Zambia - Health Sector Support Project II
Zambie - Deuxième appui au secteur de la santé

description.narrative: In response to the economic crisis of the 1980s, the government of Zambia (GRZ) formulated the Health Sector Strategic Plan (1998-2000), the purpose of which was to achieve equity of access to health facilities by all Zambians. The project under review was a continuation of Bank assistance to Zambia in this sector. The rationale of the project was to enhance access to health care and to improve quality of health care for rural communities in a sector-wide approach to health care delivery system through improved primary health care infrastructure, provision of safe drinking water, development of preventive maintenance policy, support to human resource development and capacity building at both the central and district levels. The project conformed with Bank Group Health Sector Policy and its lending strategy for Zambia. It is expected that the project would enhance access to health care of the rural communities in particular.

Outputs and Intended Beneficiaries: (i) the rehabilitation of 20 rural health centres; 20 rural health centres furnished; 20 boreholes drilled; 20 tanks and 20 pumps, including pipe work and drainage provided; 4 computers and 2 vehicles procured and workshops implemented countrywide; national policy on preventive maintenance developed; 4 Nursing training schools furnished and equipped; multiple training programmes as spelt out in the appraisal report; and PIU fully functional. d. Principal Activities/Components: The project had six major components: Improved primary health care delivery; safe water supply; Preventive maintenance; human resource development; Management capacity building; and project management.

The objectives of the project were to increase access to health care delivery and improve the quality of health services to the rural communities through the establishment of a preventive maintenance system in all districts in the country. The expected outcomes would be the realization of the objectives.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
